title: Get 25% OFF the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 Plus with this Offer!
description: Get it for a much lower price today! The post Get 25% OFF the Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 Plus with this Offer! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Get it for a much lower price today!
text: As far as Android tablets go, there are some pretty good budget-friendly devices out there from reputable brands. As such, buyers looking for a reasonably-priced device might want to check out the Galaxy Tab A9+ is currently on sale at the moment, with up to 26% off its usual retail price on Amazon. As for what you’re getting, the Tab A9+ features an 11-inch display with a 90Hz refresh rate and 1920 x 1200 pixel resolution, making it ideal for web browsing, social media apps, and content streaming. The tablet is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 695 processor aided by up to 128GB of expandable storage, all wrapped up in a sleek body with a metal chassis. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.

As for what you’re getting, the Tab A9+ features an 11-inch display with a 90Hz refresh rate and 1920 x 1200 pixel resolution, making it ideal for web browsing, social media apps, and content streaming.
